summary: Highly motivated and experienced software engineer with a strong background in developing and implementing software solutions. Proven ability to work independently and as part of a team to deliver high-quality results. Seeking a challenging role where I can utilize my skills and experience to contribute to the success of the organization.

responsibilities: Developed and maintained web applications using Python and Django.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to gather requirements and design solutions.
Implemented RESTful APIs and integrated with third-party services.
Wrote unit and integration tests to ensure code quality.
Assisted senior developers in the development of software applications.
Wrote code in Java and JavaScript.
Participated in code reviews and testing.

education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science
Bachelor of Science in Computer Engineering

projects.description: Developed a full-stack e-commerce platform with user authentication, product catalog, shopping cart, and payment gateway integration.
Designed and developed a mobile application for task management, including features like task creation, prioritization, and reminders.
